summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 50, Replat of Pontius' 2nd Addition Supplemental, from East Howell Street to East Denny Way, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8019 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
